department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences
department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: “This course is aimed towards graduate students in geophysical and ocean science, coastal and ocean engineering, and related fields. This course will first introduce the basic theory and characteristics of ocean waves, then the nearshore coastal boundary layer process, basics of sediment transport, tidal phenomenon, dynamic theory of tide, and estuary and coastal processes.“
goal.ch: 此課程目的在使地科、海洋科學、海岸及海洋工程及相關領域的研究所學生能認識近岸海洋水動力學中重要的各種物理現象及過程。本課程由介紹基礎的波浪理論開始，使學生能認識海洋波浪、近岸底部邊界層基礎特性、沈積物輸送過程，潮汐特性、河口及海岸變遷過程等。

content.en:
1. Introduction to coastal environments
2. Linear wave theory and its evolution in nearshore region
3. Turbulence and bottom boundary layer theory
4. Sedimentation and Coastal erosion
5. Tidal dynamics and Harmonic Anlysis
6. Beach Morphology and Rip Current Theory
7. Terristral material transport in estuary
content.ch:
1. 海岸環境水動力特性介紹
2. 線性波浪理論及波浪於淺水區的演變
3. 淺水區底床邊界層理論
4. 漂沙活動與海岸侵蝕淤積
5. 潮汐動力理論與調和分析
6. 海岸地形學與近岸流理論
7. 河口陸源物質的輸送
